6. Preservation: Storing data on a hard drive only is risky, the archive server may be a better alternative. See https://icts.kuleuven.be/storagewijzer/en or contact your local IT team for more information. Also note that KU Leuven RDM policy recommends 10 years of data preservation (www.kuleuven.be/rdm/en/policy)
7. Sharing: You can now also use KU Leuven RDR to make your data available for reuse: https://www.kuleuven.be/rdm/en/rdr
label: good with suggestions
